## Pulling Data

```{r tidycensus pressure, echo=FALSE}
Variables <- load_variables(2019,
                            "acs5",
                            cache = TRUE) %>%
  mutate(Merge_name = paste(name,"E", sep =""))
```


```{r colorado_data}
Col_Library <- st_read("https://opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/555e2ecd93db480daf427c8c93833d23_0.geojson") %>%
  st_drop_geometry()
#geometry files did not include any data

Awardees <- st_read("https://opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/dd51b62683a54f99b6ca2fb38a42ab06_0.geojson") %>%
  st_drop_geometry()
str(Col_Library)
#geometry files did not include any data



ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = Col_Library)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
